casebody.data:
PMG LAND ASSOCIATES, L.P.
v.
HARBOUR LANDING CONDOMINIUM ASSOCIATION, INC., et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 21, 2017

Scott M. Maser, in support of the petition.

Laura Pascale Zaino and Joshua M. Auxier, in opposition.

The plaintiffs petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 172 Conn. App. 688, 161 A.3d 596 (2017), is denied.

ESPINOSA, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
